text: Sport climbing has been included in the Asian Games since the 2018 Asian Games in Palembang, Indonesia. ==Editions== {|class=wikitable |- !width=50|Games !width=50|Year !width=180|Host city !width=160|Best nation |- | XVIII || 2018 || Jakarta–Palembang, Indonesia || |} ==Events== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" ! width="200"|Event || width=20|18 || width=40|Years |-bgcolor=#DDDDDD |colspan=3| |- |align=left| Men's speed || X || 1 |- |align=left| Men's speed relay || X || 1 |- |align=left| Men's combined || X || 1 |- |align=left| Women's speed || X || 1 |- |align=left| Women's speed relay || X || 1 |- |align=left| Women's combined || X || 1 |-bgcolor=#DDDDDD |colspan=3| |- !Total || 6 || |} ==Medal table== ==Participating nations== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! width=180|Nation ! width=20|18 !! width=40|Years |-bgcolor=#DDDDDD |colspan=3| |- |align=left| |18|| 1 |- |align=left| |1|| 1 |- |align=left| |4|| 1 |- |align=left| |3|| 1 |- |align=left| |20|| 1 |- |align=left| |8|| 1 |- |align=left| |4|| 1 |- |align=left| |13|| 1 |- |align=left| |7|| 1 |- |align=left| |3|| 1 |- |align=left| |2|| 1 |- |align=left| |2|| 1 |- |align=left| |1|| 1 |- |align=left| |7|| 1 |- |align=left| |14|| 1 |- |align=left| |14|| 1 |-bgcolor=#DDDDDD |colspan=3| |- !Number of nations ||16|| |- !Number of athletes ||121|| |} ==List of medalists== == References == == External links == * International Federation of Sport Climbing Category:Sports at the Asian Games Asian Games
